title: Scuttle Crab King at Juking
body: Is it just me or does the scuttle crab tend to juke the F*%$ out of me all the time?!?!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Hahaha the problem is allot of skillshots based champions are ap. And late game for some reason the scuttle crab is tanky as hell! so it took me about 1 whole min trying to take the good damn sucker down as ahri{{champion:103}} ...
Just when you think you got it, {{champion:98}} 'd
Good practice for landing skillshots I suppose.
